text: Hey guys! I’m Karlo and i am a full-stack developer working from Sweden! I’m so excited to be part of such community.

Hi! I'm Meaghan, a graphic designer based in NYC! I'm slowly but surely learning more about HubSpot development. We're working on designing email templates/modules right now and I will likely be reaching out for any and all advice, especially when it comes to mobile responsiveness and testing across email clients.
